name: @quenk/potoo
description: An actor model library for JavaScript.

scripts.examples: npm run -s prep:test && npm run -s build:examples ; ./node_modules/.bin/browserify --debug -o examples/examples.js examples/index.js
scripts.prep:test: npm run build:lib; rm -R ./node_modules/potoo; mkdir -p node_modules/potoo; cp -R lib node_modules/potoo; cp package.json node_modules/potoo/package.json

author: Quenk Technologies
